title: Hard Rock Hotel & Casino Punta Cana | Air & Vacation Package

hotels.name: Hard Rock Hotel Punta Cana
hotels.description: The all-inclusive Hard Rock Hotel & Casino in Punta Cana, Dominican Republic is undoubtedly unforgettable. Nestled along one of the most magnificent white-sand beaches in the Caribbean, the Hard Rock Hotel & Casino provides the perfect setting for a sun-soaked getaway. Test your skills at the 18-hole Nicklaus- designed golf course. Try your luck at one of the Caribbean's largest action-packed casinos. Turn it back down at the Rock Spa. Luxuriate in one of 11 pools with four swim-up bars and, for the kids, three pools and a dedicated Kids Club. Take in the priceless rock memorabilia on the walls. Relax at one of the fine restaurants and bars. Chill with the family at the ice cream stand. Or with just the two of you in your decadent Rock Star Suite.  All this, plus signature all-inclusive service and the incomparable rock and roll vibe of world-famous Hard Rock. It's a true one-of-a-kind experience, and just the place for family vacation, romantic escapes, weddings and getaways filled with friends. Start your world tour right here, right now.

hotels.name: Riu Palace Paradise Island
hotels.description: Located on a picture-perfect, white-sand beach just a short walk from the Atlantis Casino, the Riu Palace Paradise Island is a true oasis of fun and excitement with a distinct Bahamian flair. Featuring the All Inclusive by RIU concept, this breath- taking 379-room resort offers unmatched service, world-class activities, nightly entertainment and a property complete with a picturesque swimming pool, gourmet restaurants, inspiring ocean views and one of the most beautiful full-service spas imaginable. Now offering confirmed connecting rooms.

sightseeing.text:
Explore the best of Nassau’s local eateries and learn about authentic Bahamian dishes from chefs and local artisans who preserve its traditions. Your journey begins at a “down home” eatery serving
soul-warming Bahamian classics and includes tastings at six other local stops. Also, stop at a familyrun restaurant where the chef-owner will personally explain the secrets behind his dishes. Between tastings, stroll the streets of Nassau’s historic downtown neighborhood.

title: Breathless Cancun Soul Resort & Spa®| Air & Vacation Package

image.name: Breathless Cancun Soul Resort & Spa - Exterior

hotels.name: Breathless Cancun Soul Resort & Spa®
hotels.description: City chic meets edgy opulence at Breathless Cancun Soul Resort & Spa®. A cosmopolitan beach experience awaits at this stylish, all-suite resort nestled between the Caribbean Sea and Nichupte Lagoon. Luxuriate in an inspiring energy and curate your vacation style as you Live Big. Breathe Deep.® at the newest hot spot and soul of Cancun. Clad in sleek décor with neutral accents, this beachfront haven with 429 suites and two infinity rooftop pools is the perfect destination for socially sophisticated travelers wanting to experience lively and luxe downtown vibes with relaxing and opulent beach views (just 25 minutes from the airport and 2 miles from the vibrant Cancun strip). It’s all in the details when it comes to our style and service, and we’ve thought of everything to make your Unlimited-Luxury® experience with us epic!

title: Hilton Playa del Carmen | Air & Vacation Package

hotels.description: With sweeping ocean views, the newly renovated Hilton Playa del Carmen offers an incomparable, all-inclusive, adults-only escape that is private, elegant and romantic. We take pride in making you feel special and delivering an experience that is unforgettable. Limitless possibilities are all included at the world-renowned, adults-only Hilton Playa del Carmen, located just steps away from the famous Fifth Avenue. New suites. New restaurants. New bars. title: Jewel Grande Montego Bay Resort & Spa | Air & Vacation Package

hotels.name: Jewel Grande Montego Bay Resort & Spa
hotels.description:
Escape to a Jamaican paradise and enjoy resort living at its finest. Ideally located minutes from Sangster International Airport and situated on a dazzling private cove, Jewel Grande offer guests an elevated experience with world-class service and premium amenities.
Indulge in butler service, a full-service spa, private beachside cabanas, two oceanfront swimming pools and stunning meeting and event space-all
at the foot of the Caribbean Sea. From one- and two-bedroom suites, to junior suites, to elaborate penthouse apartment style accommodations
and three-bedroom townhouses, Jewel Grande lives up to its namesake. Experience the finest the Caribbean has to offer for multi-generational
family travel, executive retreats and discerning individuals looking for luxury and extra spacious accommodations in Jamaica.
features: Butler service (In 2 Bedroom and higher suites)

title: Secrets Tides Punta Cana | Air & Vacation Package

hotels.name: Secrets Tides
hotels.description: Secrets Tides Punta Cana is an idyllic seaside haven perfectly located on nearly 800 feet (262 yards) of picturesque palm studded beach in Uvero Alto. With woven palapa-covered walkways from entrance to the sea, and a winding lobby built around lush vegetation, you will feel immersed in nature – whether indoors or out in the warm Caribbean sun. The resort’s 668 suites were designed to reflect a luxury residential community, with each set of suites having a unique atmosphere and visual approach. Feel at home while experiencing an infusion of local ambiance and leave all the details to your concierge or dedicated butler (for those in Preferred Club)Opening January 15, 2024

title: Secrets® Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort | Air & Vacation Package

hotels.name: Secrets Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort
hotels.description: Secrets Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort is located in beautiful Playa Mujeres, complete with famous white sandy beaches and stunning ocean views in a privileged gated community. This brand new, AAA Four Diamond award winning adults-only, all-suite resort is only 35 minutes from the Cancun International Airport and 10 minutes from downtown Cancun, in an 18-hole signature Greg Norman golf course and in close proximity to the best shopping centers, beachfront restaurants and nightlife in the area. This Unlimited-Luxury resort will welcome its guests with an elevated club house with spectacular views of the ocean and just steps away from some of the resort's gourmet restaurants, fitness center and spa. Open-air spaces make it ideal to enjoy the warm ocean breeze. It features a protected area with flora and fauna located between the reception area and the main pool section where some of the region's flowers and birds can be seen and photographed. Visit the Secrets Spa by Pevonia and choose from a selection of the most relaxing and results-driven treatments available. Guests can find the perfect spa products in the charming boutique to continue enjoying the results back at home and extend its beneficial effects. Secrets Playa Mujeres offers guests 424 luxurious, comfortable suites complete with finely appointed amenities, swim-out access or spectacular views of the Caribbean Sea, private balconies or terraces and beautiful decor featuring local wood elements. The Unlimited-Luxury experience continues with exquisite dining options providing guests with a unique collection of gourmet a la carte restaurants and lounges. Celebrate authentic Mexican traditions and taste distinctive recipes at the upscale restaurants, or listen to live music at Desires Music Lounge. Nightly entertainment includes exciting live music and shows, theme parties or movies under the stars. It's all included here at the new Secrets Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort - Exclusive. Alluring. Pure.

Combining beautiful architectural design with impeccable service and lavish accommodations, this all-inclusive resort is a vacation paradise like no other.

hotels.name: Zoetry Casa Del Mar Los Cabos
hotels.description: The hotel is located in the Los Cabos Tourist Corridor. The city centre of San Jose del Cabo is around 15 minutes' drive away, where guest can find restaurants and shopping facilities. Bars and tourist facilities are located in Cabo San Lucas, around 25 minutes' drive away. The hotel is situated in a beautiful landscape where the desert meets the white sand and blue water of the Sea of Cortez. The air-conditioned hotel offers a total of 32 rooms. Facilities include a lobby with 24-hour reception and check-out service, a hotel safe and currency exchange facilities. Further amenities include a bar, a restaurant and WLAN Internet access. Room and laundry services are also available. The hotel's suites feature the classic architecture of traditional Mexican haciendas. Rooms are fully-equipped as standard featuring a plasma TV with satellite/cable, a safe and a minibar.

title: Dreams® Sands Cancun Resort & Spa | Air & Vacation Package

hotels.name: Dreams Sands Cancun Resort & Spa
hotels.description: Perfectly situated along a breathtaking white sand beach in the heart of Cancun's Hotel Zone, sits Dreams Sands Cancun Resort & Spa! Experience all the great inclusions of Unlimited-Luxury at our newest beach-front resort - where there's something fun for every age. Dreams Sands Cancun is walking distance from great shopping, restaurants and bars, a short 15 minutes away from downtown Cancun and only 30 minutes away from Cancun International Airport. All elegantly appointed rooms offer breathtaking views of the Caribbean Sea and Isla Mujeres, a king size bed or two double beds, luxurious bathrooms, spacious bathroom with luxury bath amenities, a daily refreshed mini-bar with beer, soft drinks, juices and bottled water, an alarm clock with MP3 docking station and an iPod charger, and 24-hour room service. The Dreams Spa by Pevonia offers a soothing atmosphere of pule indulgence that features indigenous treatments on a full spa menu of body treatments and rejuvenating therapies. The Explorer's Club keeps your kids happy and busy with their own supervised fun. Dreams Sands Cancun sits on a 650-foot stretch of pristine white beach with activities to make the whole family happy. Two pools, an outdoor Jacuzzi and non-motorized water sports are available, and the Dreams Entertainment Team will provide daytime activities and nighttime entertainment. Choose from ten magnificent dining options featuring international gourmet cuisine. Four festive bars and lounges will serve a wide menu of unlimited top-shelf spirits. Perfect your swing at a nearby golf course with complimentary greens fees. Dreams Sands Cancun provides its guests a new and better way to have it all in the extraordinary destination of Cancun.

hotels.description: This is an ADULTS ONLY resort, exclusively for over 18s, where you can enjoy a perfect holiday by the Dominican Republic's most famous beach. Its facilities include everything you might need to spend wonderful days relaxing, doing sports or taking part in different activities with your partner or friends: two large infinity pools with spacious sun terraces, gym, free Jacuzzi and steambath, and a wellness center including a beauty parlor, hairdresser's and massage service (on payment).

title: Riu Palace Antillas | Air & Vacation Package

hotels.name: Riu Palace Antillas
hotels.description: Featuring newly designed rooms, this adults only resort is ideal for a fantastic and romantic vacation. A place to relax, with a free gym, spa and a beauty and hair salon inviting you to a wide variety of treatments. Perfect for those who enjoy the sun, offering free lounge chairs, sun umbrellas and towels, both at the wonderful swimming pool and on the Palm Beach itself. Furthermore, a complete entertainment program offers the possibility of trying out many different water activities: water sports such as windsurfing, snorkeling and kayaking, and even a diving test in the swimming pool. A golf course, bicycle rental and the possibility of interesting hiking routes are all available in the surrounding area. Now offering confirmed connected rooms.

hotels.name: Iberostar Grand Rose Hall
hotels.description: Guests at IBEROSTAR Hotels & Resorts are sure to relax with rejuvenating spa and wellness treatments, challenging golf courses, and idyllic beaches. The all-inclusive experience offers unlimited land sports, non-motorized water sports, professional show and live music, plus specialty restaurants, buffets, lounges, and swim-up bars. They also offer a series of unforgettable Adults Only experiences, like a romantic dinner for two in your room, wellness activities, wine tastings, brunches, and nightclubs. For added luxury, choose one of IBEROSTAR's Grand properties in Jamaica, the Dominican Republic and Mexico with luxurious amenities, innovative cuisine, and impeccable service.

title: Secrets® Papagayo Costa Rica | Air & Vacation Package

image.name: Secrets Papagayo Costa Rica Vacation Package

hotels.name: Secrets Papagayo
hotels.description: Set in the exuberant Arenilla beach, Secrets Papagayo Costa Rica will offer adults a stunning Unlimited-Luxury getaway in Costa Rica's Gulf of Papagayo. The secure community around Secrets Papagayo provides striking views of native flora and fauna and miles of unspoiled Pacific Coast beach. This all-suite resort boasts 202 spacious suites, each with a private balcony or terrace as well as a superb Unlimited-Luxury experience starting with 24-hour room service, a daily refreshed mini-bar and more. The Preferred Club will provide an enhanced level of luxury with 65 ocean view suites and additional privileges including access to a private lounge, upgraded bath amenities and mini-bar, concierge service, pillow menu and much more. Guests will enjoy limitless gourmet cuisine, without reservations, at four restaurants and one cafe in addition to five bars that will serve unlimited top-shelf spirits. Days and nights are filled with land, beach and water activities and live entertainment. Two pools and a pristine beach await. Rejuvenation reigns supreme at the Secrets Spa by Pevonia, offering massage, body and facial treatments in 13 treatment rooms and a full-service beauty salon. Follow up this rejuvenation at the fully equipped fitness center or by taking part in one of many daily and nighttime activities. Just 20 minutes from the Liberia Airport and a mere 15 minutes from the touristic town of Coco Beach, Secrets Papagayo offers guests a privileged location both within the resort and throughout the area for an ideal Unlimited-Luxury getaway on the Pacific Coast.

hotels.name: Coral Iberostar at Selection Bavaro
hotels.description: This hotel allows you to enjoy the exclusivity of reserved spaces and personalized Premium services without sacrificing the advantages of staying at a large resort on the Caribbean Sea. What is exclusive and what is Premium? Here are a few hints: Suite-style rooms in an unmatched location, with the tranquility offered by areas on the beach and pool that are specially designed with you in mind, along with 24-hour concierge service. One-of-a-kind buffet with show cooking, priority booking in restaurants and wine selection. Complimentary appetizers in the beach club as well as in the lounge itself. And as for the advantages offered by a large resort? Make the most of all of the services and facilities at Iberostar Selection Bávaro Suites, with endless culinary options and different pools, a 3-floor fitness center, a Spa with 21 massage booths and an 18-hole golf course designed by P.B. Dye. Can you picture it? Coral level: a first-class experience.

title: Iberostar Grand Bávaro | Air & Vacation Package

hotels.name: Iberostar Grand Bavaro
hotels.description: This majestic adults only hotel, where the minimum age to stay 18 years old, is our finest all inclusive hotel in Dominican Republic. It offers 2 pools on site (1 lake & 1 activity pool). This hotel offers a 2 story ocean front spa. In addition guests enjoy full access to all neighbouring hotels within the Iberostar Bavaro Golf & Spa Resort. This hotel is located right at the most beautiful white-sand beach of Bavaro, in the eastern Dominican Republic. Only 35 minutes away from Punta Cana International Airport. Hotel consists of 260 suites, 13 Ocean- Front Suites and 1 Presidential Suite. All suites have intimate whirlpool overlooking the balcony with a view of the ocean or gardens. We offer a unique Concierge & Butler service offering personalized assistance for dining reservations, pillow menu selections in room food & cocktail preferences and many other caterings.
